definitions:


1. Country of reception-based normalization

of all papers in the country of reception that are from migrant authors from a country X, the percentage that are in a given field.


i: country of reception
j: country of origin
f: field
$$
\frac{\frac{\#_{i,f}^{j}}{\#_{i}^{j}}}{\frac{\#_{f}^{j}}{\#^{j}}}
$$
